en: Double tap to toggle favorite status
pt-BR: Double tap to toggle favorite status
você tirou uma captura de tela

en: Bluetooth is turned off. Please turn on Bluetooth in Settings to use BitChat.
pt-BR: O Bluetooth está desligado. Ative-o em Ajustes para usar o bitchat.

en: BitChat needs Bluetooth permission to connect with nearby devices. Please enable Bluetooth access in Settings.
pt-BR: O bitchat precisa de permissão de Bluetooth para conectar a dispositivos próximos. Habilite o acesso em Ajustes.

en: This device does not support Bluetooth. BitChat requires Bluetooth to function.
pt-BR: Este dispositivo não oferece suporte a Bluetooth. O bitchat requer Bluetooth para funcionar.

en: private messages encrypted with noise protocol
pt-BR: private messages encrypted with noise protocol

en: messages relay through peers, going the distance
pt-BR: messages relay through peers, going the distance

en: get notified when your favorite people join
pt-BR: get notified when your favorite people join

en: geohash channels to chat with people in nearby regions over decentralized anonymous relays
pt-BR: geohash channels to chat with people in nearby regions over decentralized anonymous relays

en: works without internet using Bluetooth low energy
pt-BR: works without internet using Bluetooth low energy

en: • tap a peer's name to start a DM
pt-BR: • tap a peer's name to start a DM

en: • set your nickname by tapping it
pt-BR: • set your nickname by tapping it

en: no servers, accounts, or data collection
pt-BR: no servers, accounts, or data collection

en: triple-tap logo to instantly clear all data
pt-BR: triple-tap logo to instantly clear all data

en: private message security has not yet been fully audited. do not use for critical situations until this warning disappears.
pt-BR: private message security has not yet been fully audited. do not use for critical situations until this warning disappears.

en: Block or list blocked peers. Usage: /block [nickname]
pt-BR: Block or list blocked peers. Usage: /block [nickname]

en: cannot block %@: not found or unable to verify identity
pt-BR: cannot block %@: not found or unable to verify identity

en: blocked %@. you will no longer receive messages from them
pt-BR: bloqueado %@. você não receberá mais mensagens dessa pessoa

en:
commands:
/msg @name - start private chat
/who - list who's online
/clear - clear messages
/hug @name - send a hug
/slap @name - slap with a trout
/fav @name - add to favorites
/unfav @name - remove from favorites
/block @name - block
/unblock @name - unblock
pt-BR:
commands:
/msg @name - start private chat
/who - list who's online
/clear - clear messages
/hug @name - send a hug
/slap @name - slap with a trout
/fav @name - add to favorites
/unfav @name - remove from favorites
/block @name - block
/unblock @name - unblock

en: Send someone a warm hug. Usage: /hug <nickname>
pt-BR: Send someone a warm hug. Usage: /hug <nickname>
não foi possível encontrar o par: %@

en: Slap someone with a trout. Usage: /slap <nickname>
pt-BR: Slap someone with a trout. Usage: /slap <nickname>

en: no one else is online right now
pt-BR: no one else is online right now

en: compare these fingerprints with %@ using a secure channel.
pt-BR: compare these fingerprints with %@ using a secure channel.

en: you have verified this person's identity.
pt-BR: you have verified this person's identity.

en: chat with people near you using geohash channels. only a coarse geohash is shared, never exact gps.
pt-BR: chat with people near you using geohash channels. only a coarse geohash is shared, never exact gps.

en: location permission denied. enable in settings to use location channels.
pt-BR: location permission denied. enable in settings to use location channels.

en: cannot send message: user is blocked.
pt-BR: não é possível enviar a mensagem: o usuário está bloqueado.

en: cannot send message to %@: user is blocked.
pt-BR: não é possível enviar a mensagem para %@: o usuário está bloqueado.

en: cannot send: not in a location channel
pt-BR: não é possível enviar: não está em um canal de localização

en: Cannot send message to %@ - peer is not reachable via mesh or Nostr.
pt-BR: Não é possível enviar mensagem para %@ — par inacessível via malha ou Nostr.

en: cannot start chat with %@: user is blocked.
pt-BR: não é possível iniciar chat com %@: o usuário está bloqueado.

en: cannot start chat with %@: mutual favorite required for offline messaging.
pt-BR: não é possível iniciar chat com %@: é necessário favorito mútuo para mensagens offline.

en: failed to send to location channel
pt-BR: falha ao enviar para o canal de localização
